milestones.title: Project Charter / Topic Assessment Form (TAF)
milestones.description: Formal submission defining the project scope, group members, and official topic approval (IT4010).
milestones.deliverableFocus: Project scope definition and topic approval

milestones.title: Project Proposal Report (Draft)
milestones.description: Draft submission of the complete academic report detailing the Research Problem, Objectives, Detailed Literature Survey, and the initial development Methodology.
milestones.deliverableFocus: Research problem, objectives, literature survey, methodology

milestones.title: Project Proposal Report (Final)
milestones.description: Final submission of the complete academic report detailing the Research Problem, Objectives, Detailed Literature Survey, and the initial development Methodology.
milestones.deliverableFocus: Full scope, research problem, initial literature survey, methodology

milestones.title: Progress Presentation I (PP1)
milestones.description: Presentation covering the completed literature review, selection of core datasets, and detailed planning for the ML model implementations (e.g., Anomaly-Based Clustering and Phishing Detection methodologies).
milestones.phase: Phase 2: Progress and Proof of Concept
milestones.deliverableFocus: Detailed literature review, finalized datasets, and initial model planning (Module 1/4)

milestones.title: Research Paper (Completed)
milestones.description: A condensed, publication-ready paper focusing on the novel aspects of the framework's methodology and technical contributions. (Completed but not yet published)
milestones.deliverableFocus: Concise academic summary of novel methodology and final results

milestones.title: Progress Presentation II (PP2)
milestones.description: Presentation focusing on model building completion (including achieved accuracy/metrics), backend API integration status, and readiness for final system integration testing.
milestones.phase: Phase 2: Progress and Proof of Concept
milestones.deliverableFocus: Proof of Concept, model building progress, implementation status, and integration planning

milestones.title: Final Report (Document)
milestones.description: The definitive written document covering all work, from requirements analysis and design to final evaluation, mitigation strategies, and conclusions.
milestones.deliverableFocus: Comprehensive documentation of design, development, results, analysis, and conclusions

milestones.title: Final Presentation & VIVA
milestones.description: The compulsory oral examination and live system demonstration, defending the research findings and proving the functionality of the integrated APT Detection and Mitigation Framework.
milestones.deliverableFocus: Oral defense of the complete project, system demonstration, and technical Q&A

milestones.title: Project Website
milestones.description: Communication and presentation of the project to a wider audience through a comprehensive project website.
milestones.deliverableFocus: Communication and presentation of the project to a wider audience

milestones.title: Research Logbook/Status Docs
milestones.description: Continuous tracking of individual and group progress, decision-making, and weekly status updates throughout the project lifecycle.
milestones.deliverableFocus: Continuous tracking of individual and group progress, decision-making, and weekly status updates
